definitions.text: keep company with; hang out with
arrange or order by classes or categories
examples: How would you classify these pottery shards--are they prehistoric?

definitions.text: consisting of a haphazard assortment of different kinds; ; ; ; ; ; - I.A.Richards
examples: an arrangement of assorted spring flowers
a mixed program of baroque and contemporary music
sundry sciences commonly known as social

definitions.text: of many different kinds purposefully arranged but lacking any uniformity
examples: his disguises are many and various
various experiments have failed to disprove the theory
cited various reasons for his behavior
